source_text: Patient: James Wilson (PT-123456), SSN: 456-78-9012. DOB: 1965-03-22. Chief complaint: Chest pain and shortness of breath. Initial assessment: Possible acute coronary syndrome.

Provider Note PT-789012: Patient Margaret Chen presents with major depressive disorder with suicidal ideation. History of bipolar I disorder. Current medications: Lithium 900mg, Seroquel 200mg. Confidential psychiatric evaluation attached.
Lab Results for PT-345678 (DOB: 1988-11-15). HIV screening: POSITIVE. CD4 count: 450 cells/mm3. Viral load: 12,000 copies/mL. Hepatitis C antibody: REACTIVE.

Genetic counseling report: Patient Amanda Roberts (PT-901234) tested positive for BRCA1 gene mutation. Recommended prophylactic mastectomy. Family history of breast cancer in mother and maternal aunt.
Oncology Note: PT-567890, Mr. David Thompson. Diagnosis: Stage IV non-small cell lung cancer with brain metastases. Prognosis: 6-12 months. Patient requests palliative care only. DNR order signed.
Addiction Medicine: Patient PT-234567 (Susan Martinez, SSN: 789-01-2345) enrolled in methadone maintenance program. History of IV heroin use. Last use: 2024-01-15. Hepatitis B positive.
OB/GYN Note: PT-678901, Ms. Jennifer Anderson. G3P2. Pregnancy terminated at 12 weeks due to fetal abnormalities. Genetic testing revealed Trisomy 18. Patient counseled on future pregnancies.

Emergency Psychiatric Evaluation: PT-012345 (William Garcia), brought by police on 5150 hold. Acute psychotic episode with command auditory hallucinations. Diagnosis: Schizophrenia, paranoid type. Involuntary admission recommended.

Pediatric Note: PT-456789 (Minor child Emma Davis, DOB: 2018-05-20). Parents: John and Sarah Davis. Suspected child abuse - multiple bruises in various stages of healing. CPS notified. Photos documented.

Infectious Disease Consultation: PT-890123, Ricardo Hernandez. Newly diagnosed HIV with CD4 count of 180. Started on Biktarvy. Contact tracing initiated. Partner notification pending. Tuberculosis screening negative.

Endocrinology Note: PT-345012, formerly known as Michael now Michelle Torres. Gender dysphoria diagnosis. Started hormone replacement therapy (estradiol 2mg daily). Surgical referral for gender confirmation surgery.
Patient Registration: PT-789456. Name: Catherine Lee, SSN: 321-54-9876. Insurance: Blue Cross PPO, Policy #BC789456123, Group #G-45892. Emergency contact: Michael Lee (husband) 555-234-5678.

Billing Record: PT-123789. Procedure: Colonoscopy with polypectomy. ICD-10: K63.5 (Polyp of colon). CPT: 45385. Credit card on file: Visa ****4521. Total charges: $3,450.00. Patient responsible: $850.00.

Referral Letter: Dear Dr. Anderson, Please see PT-567234 (Maria Gonzalez) for evaluation of chronic migraine with medication overuse. Current medications include Sumatriptan 100mg PRN and Topiramate 100mg BID. Past history includes anxiety disorder.

Discharge Summary: PT-901567 (Robert Kim), admitted 2024-02-01, discharged 2024-02-05. Diagnosis: Acute myocardial infarction, anterior wall. Procedures: Cardiac catheterization, PCI with drug-eluting stent to LAD. Home address: 456 Pine Street, Apt 12B, Seattle, WA 98101.

Allergy Documentation: PT-234890. Patient Linda Brown has documented allergies to: Penicillin (anaphylaxis), Sulfa drugs (rash), Latex (hives), Codeine (nausea). High-risk for anesthetic complications.
Immunization Record: PT-678234 (Minor: Alex Johnson, DOB: 2020-08-15). Vaccines administered today: DTaP #4, IPV #4, MMR #2. Parent/Guardian: Sarah Johnson. Next appointment: 2024-06-15 for Tdap.

Surgical Consent: PT-012678 (Patricia Williams, SSN: 654-32-1098). Procedure: Laparoscopic cholecystectomy. Risks discussed: bleeding, infection, bile duct injury, conversion to open surgery. Patient competent, consent signed.

Radiology Report: PT-456012. CT Chest with contrast. Findings: 2.3cm spiculated nodule in right upper lobe, highly suspicious for malignancy. Multiple enlarged mediastinal lymph nodes. Impression: Likely lung cancer with mediastinal metastases. Urgent pulmonology referral recommended.
Provider Information: Dr. Emily Watson, MD. NPI: 1234567890. DEA: AW1234567. Medical License: CA-123456. Specialty: Internal Medicine. Email: ewatson@hospital.org. Phone: (555) 987-6543.
